thread.section_title: Verc Car Rental Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Verc Car Rental | verc.com
thread.title: RACHEL
thread.title_full: Verc Car Rental reviewed by RACHEL

author: RACHEL
title: RACHEL
text:
The staff at Verc Renatals consistently make sure that each rental is the right fit. Having several locations on the South Shore make it easy to pick up and drop off rentals, important for me as I am usually getting a flight from/to the West Coast.
Additionally Verc has a fleet of passenger vans which make it easy to accommodate a group for outings around New England. I wish there was a Verc in CA!
